caption.title: The Finn’s cycling index expresses the amount of detritus that is recycled relative to the total throughput of the system.
caption.p: Mean ± SE values per mesocosm are given ( n = 3). Significant effects ( p < 0.05) are based on two-way ANOVAs with OA and T (df = 1,8) and are indicated with asterisks. Means with different lower case letters indicate significant difference among treatments. See S3 Table for statistical test outcomes. OA, elevated CO 2; T, elevated temperature.
